name: Kendamatron
description:
Kendamatron is a little kendama toy come to life, using his head to wrap around his environment and hit targets. He can even bound off his own head to reach heights only dreamed of. He must use these techniques to navigate the quiet factory where he was designed.

Controls:
Arrow Keys/D-Pad: Move
Space Bar/A Button: Jump
R Key/Right Bumper: Hold to Reset

Produced with Pixel Game Maker MV for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, "Joined Together".

Game design and sound design by MizunoKetsuban. Level design and graphic design assisted by my friend Ethan. Music produced by VLAD: https://soundcloud.com/vladvulpes
